features: WITH 100% NATURAL COCONUT MILK AND ALOE VERA: TRESemmé Botanique Nourish Conditioner is enriched with 100% natural coconut milk and aloe vera, and replenishes and nourishes hair
REPLENISHES + NOURISHES: This Hydrating Conditioner replenishes and moisturizes your hair, leaving it feeling hydrated and beautifully soft all day long
TRUSTED INGREDIENTS: TRESemmé Botanique Nourish Conditioner is PETA-approved cruelty-free and has 0% parabens, mineral oil, and DMDM Hydantoin

PRO STYLE TECHNOLOGY: TRESemmé Botanique Nourish Conditioner Hair Care is made with Pro Style Technology, infused with amino acids and ceramide, and makes hair 2x stronger and more manageable with continued use (vs. non-conditioning shampoo)
SALON-QUALITY IN EVERY WASH: This professional hair conditioner is a salon-level formula designed to leave your hair more manageable and easier to style
HAIR CARE TIPS FROM OUR STYLISTS: For best results, start your routine with our TRESemmé Botanique Nourish hydrating shampoo
body.description: TRESemmé Botanique Nourish Hydrating Conditioner is infused with salon-inspired ingredients like 100% natural coconut milk and aloe vera, and provides moisture to your hair, leaving it feeling hydrated and beautifully soft all day long. This salon-quality Botanique Nourish hydrating shampoo and conditioner duo gently cleanses while replenishing and nourishing hair. This hydrating shampoo and conditioner system is made with Pro Style Technology, with amino acids and ceramide, and makes hair 2x stronger and more manageable (vs. non-conditioning shampoo). Our advanced formula gives you salon-quality results in every wash. Start your routine with TRESemmé Botanique Nourish Hydrating Shampoo and for best results, follow with the TRESemmé Botanique Nourish Conditioner. Use this hydrating conditioner regularly for soft, shiny, hydrated hair. This TRESemmé collection is PETA-certified cruelty-free and has 0% parabens, mineral oil, and DMDM Hydantoin. How to use the Botanique Nourish System: Step 1: Apply the TRESemmé Botanique Nourish Shampoo to wet hair liberally and gently massage the scalp and roots with fingertips to work into a lather, then rinse. Step 2: After shampooing, lightly squeeze this hair conditioner from roots to ends and rinse thoroughly. Step 3: Finish and style with your favorite TRESemmé products. This TRESemmé repairing conditioner is free from Parabens, Mineral Oil, and DMDM Hydantoin. We've always understood that style is more than a look, it's a powerful tool to help you achieve your dreams. With our professional quality care, a world of style possibilities is yours to achieve. Every choice we make at TRESemmé, from the values we promote-such as not testing on animals and being PETA-approved-to the carefully selected ingredients we use, are made to give you professional salon quality haircare products you can trust. Because 70 years on, we believe in the power of style.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Salon stylists know great style starts with the right wash and care foundation. TRESemmé Pro Style Technology, with amino acids and ceramide, works from the inside out and leaves hair strong and manageable*. Make your hair the perfect style canvas. *with continued use.

SOFT, SMOOTH STRANDS Our Botanique Nourish system, with a blend of 100% natural coconut milk and aloe vera, gently cleanses while replenishing and nourishing hair to leave it feeling hydrated and beautifully soft. STRONG STRANDS READY FOR ANY STYLE These salon-level formulas, with Pro Style Technology, leave hair strong and effortlessly manageable so you have the perfect base to create any style. TRUSTED INGREDIENTS This collection is PETA cruelty-free and has 0% parabens, mineral oil, and DMDM Hydantoin. PROFESSIONAL, SALON QUALITY EVERY TIME TRESemmé is dedicated to creating professional-quality, trend-inspired products that care for your hair and help you style it however you want.

TRESemmé Botanique Nourish Shampoo, 28 oz TRESemmé Effortless Waves Shampoo, 28 oz TRESemmé Effortless Waves Conditioner, 28 oz Main Benefit TRESemmé Botanique Nourish Shampoo nourishes hair to leave it feeling hydrated and beautifully soft. TRESemmé Effortless Waves Shampoo locks in moisture for gorgeous definition and protection against frizz. TRESemmé Effortless Waves Conditioner moisturizes hair and tames frizz.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for my hair
reviews.reviewText: I really like this conditioner. Its at a good price and its very good. The smell of coconut is fantastic. My girl said she liked how my hair smelled. It also leaves so smooth and it doesn't look dry anymore.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Crazy impressed by this stuff! Amazing conditioner for the price!
reviews.reviewText: I am super, super, super picky about conditioner for my hair- it is impossible for me to find something that works well. I have medium length, fine, curly hair and use a conditioning mask nearly every time I wash my hair because normal conditioners just aren't enough. There's always something not right: not moisturizing enough, leaves a residue, leaves my roots too oily, etc. etc.I can't believe how well this stuff worked on my hair. It seems silly but one of the first things I noticed was how the ingredient list was a fraction of the size of most others and there were no silicones that I could find (something I avoid putting on my hair unless absolutely necessary). My hair drank this up and felt so silky smooth which is almost unheard of for me without detangler or leave-in conditioner. Not only that but it didn't weigh my hair down at all and smelled great.As an added bonus, my hubby also tried it and his scalp tends to be pretty sensitive on what he can use for shampoo and conditioner and he said this didn't give him any issues at all and he really liked it.For four large bottles under $20 this is a really great deal- especially when I've been buying crazy expensive salon-level conditioners that don't perform nearly as well as this!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Little goes a long way!
reviews.reviewText: What a great value! All four bottles were neatly shipped in a box together, and arrived without any damage. The conditioner is great, it leaves my hair super silky, soft, and moisturized. It really helped with some of the winter static that I was experiencing. a little bit of this conditioner went a really long way I have longer hair with extensions so it’s much thicker. I did not use the normal amount of product that I usually would as it coated my hair really well. I really love the smell of this conditioner as well, it’s not too overpowering, but strong enough to make my hair smell great all day.
